tool.name: IDPosteriorErrorProbability
tool.description: Estimates probabilities for incorrectly assigned peptide sequences and a set of search engine scores using a mixture model.
tool.command:
IDPosteriorErrorProbability
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_out_plot: -out_plot $param_out_plot #end if #if $param_split_charge: -split_charge #end if #if $param_top_hits_only: -top_hits_only #end if #if $param_ignore_bad_data: -ignore_bad_data #end if #if $param_prob_correct: -prob_correct #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_fdr_for_targets_smaller: -fdr_for_targets_smaller $adv_opts.param_fdr_for_targets_smaller #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_fit_algorithm_number_of_bins: -fit_algorithm:number_of_bins $adv_opts.param_fit_algorithm_number_of_bins #end if #if $adv_opts.param_fit_algorithm_incorrectly_assigned: -fit_algorithm:incorrectly_assigned $adv_opts.param_fit_algorithm_incorrectly_assigned #end if #if $adv_opts.param_fit_algorithm_max_nr_iterations: -fit_algorithm:max_nr_iterations $adv_opts.param_fit_algorithm_max_nr_iterations #end if #end if

param.name: param_split_charge
param.label: The search engine scores are split by charge if this flag is set
param.help: (-split_charge) Thus, for each charge state a new model will be computed

param.name: param_top_hits_only
param.label: If set only the top hits of every PeptideIdentification will be used

param.name: param_ignore_bad_data
param.label: If set errors will be written but ignored
param.help: (-ignore_bad_data) Useful for pipelines with many datasets where only a few are bad, but the pipeline should run through

param.name: param_prob_correct
param.label: If set scores will be calculated as '1 - ErrorProbabilities' and can be interpreted as probabilities for correct identifications

param.name: param_fdr_for_targets_smaller
param.label: Only used, when top_hits_only set
param.help: (-fdr_for_targets_smaller) Additionally, target/decoy information should be available. The score_type must be q-value from an previous False Discovery Rate run

param.name: param_fit_algorithm_number_of_bins
param.label: Number of bins used for visualization
param.help: (-number_of_bins) Only needed if each iteration step of the EM-Algorithm will be visualized

param.name: param_fit_algorithm_incorrectly_assigned
param.label: for 'Gumbel', the Gumbel distribution is used to plot incorrectly assigned sequences
param.help: (-incorrectly_assigned) For 'Gauss', the Gauss distribution is used

param.name: param_fit_algorithm_max_nr_iterations
param.label: Bounds the number of iterations for the EM algorithm when convergence is slow

tool.help:
Estimates probabilities for incorrectly assigned peptide sequences and a set of search engine scores using a mixture model.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_IDPosteriorErrorProbability.html
